replies.message: Hi Esraa. This may be because another admin removed you as an admin. The best thing you can do is reach out to the other admins and ask them to add you back. Learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1lPtOvN - Kristen

Yes this is what actually happened, unfortunately I was the only admin on the page after that made that person became admin by mailing the work ban to access it again
Please help me access and punish the thief
Thank you for your interest please reply and help me

Please please reply I'm sorry but I really don't find the report at this link http://on.fb.me/1lPtOvN

Could you please help me restore the page again from the thief
I Know, Facebook can only deactivate my ID, but Facebook has no solution for Illegal Page Hacking. My 513K Page was hacked by someone, but Facebook, I know, You will never help us..

I am agree with you I want to say that unfortunately were eliminated on the page no longer available in my faves
Thank you Facebook help -_-
